text: Ann McLaughlin Korologos (born Ann Lauenstein; November 16, 1941 â€” January 30, 2023), formerly known as Ann Dore McLaughlin, is an American politician. She was the United States Secretary of Labor from 1987 to 1989. ==Other websites== *A Few Good Women... Ann M.
